answers.answer: I had preeclampsia with my daughter was induced at 34 weeks. I'm now 8 weeks pregnant and nervous about getting it again. The doctor just told me shes gonna be checking me more since its more likely to happen again

I had severe pre-eclampsia as well. Induced at 35 weeks. She only weighed 4lb6oz. She will be 6 months on the 15th and I'm already 9 weeks and 2 days. Just do some light exercise, eat right and pray for a healthy baby and a safe delivery! My doctor told me it's usually common in the first pregnancy so I really hope with the pregnancies being so close I don't go through that again. Good luck :)
Thank you! My son was born at 27 wks its very scary knowing I could posilbe have it again. I'm def gonna look up some light exercises and healthier diets thanks again and good luck to you both.
Pre eclampsia is most common in first pregnancies....that being said just keep an eye out and if your super concerned get your blood pressure taken frequently

I had it my first pregnancy too. My doctor said it usually doesn't happen twice. It's just that compared to women who have never had it, We have a higher risk of getting it again. But thats compared to someone whose never had it Lol. So you'll probably be fine. I'm currently 25 weeks and no sign of preeclampsia coming back.

question: Im 23 i have a 15 month old baby boy who was born 3 months early weighing 1 lb 11 oz... Just found out im Currently 5 weeks & 4 days pregnant just wondering if any has any advice TIA
title: pregnant after having severe preeclampsia
